Departure And Attendance Must Be In H:i Time Format

response.name: All Values Are Required
Max Length Of Commercial_Name
Max Length Of Scientefic Name
Quantity must be a valid number and greater than zero
Purchasing Price Must Be A Valid Double And Greater Than Zero
Selling Price Must Be A Valid Double And Greater Than Zero
Bonus Price Must Be A Valid Double And Greater Than Zero
Concentrate Must be a valid double and greater than zero
Entry Date Format
Expire Date Format
Expire Date Must Be After Entry Date
Commercial Name and scientefic name must unique
Fetch All Providers
Data are the same , so nothing to do
All Markting Offers
